name: SneakySpheres
description:
The Game:

Sneaky Spheres is a sort of action, maze game. You are the blue Hero-Sphere and you want to find all 6 goal stones inside the maze. But the Problem is there are other, sneaky spheres who wanna stop you. Do not touch them !!

Can you overcome all 3 Levels?

I created the basic structure of this game on a one day game Jam @BerlinMiniJam

***************************************************************************************************

Thank you for playing!

Follow me on Twitter for more Information about my upcoming games:

@KeomaTrippner

***************************************************************************************************
